title: [Champion Concept] Alen, the Blue Lotus Swordsman
body:
Alen is the youngest son of a rich Demacian noble. His father provided him the very best teachers who have trained him for years so he could achieve perfect practice in swordsmanship. At the age of 14 he joined the Blue Lotus Order. It's main goal was to help the people most in need and protect the citizens from dangers that could wait for them during their travel. Two years later, when Noxus forces invaded Ionia, the members of the Order came all the way along to help Ionians defend their land. All of them died except for Alen nad his master, Alrond. They both decided to fulfill the will of fallen friends and the Order founder and find the legendary Blade of Blue Lotus named Neela. After weeks of searching, they finally made it to the place it was hidden. They gained the sword but soon ancient guardians appeared and Alrond died, buying time for Alen to escape. After that he made a choice to continue the life he lived until now, using his two swords to help the people living on the land stained with his friends' blood that was soon to become his new home.


**ALEN
THE BLUE LOTUS SWORDSMAN**

		                                            **Stats** 
Health:	              542–2020		                 Attack Damage:	      68–124.1
Health Regen.:     8–18.5                                       Attack Speed:	      0.67  (+ 0 – 53.6%)
Mana:                   410–1140                                  Armor:	                      34–92.6
Mana Regen.:      10.5–22.5                                  Magic Resistance:     32.1–53.4
Range:	              150		                                 Movement Speed:     345


**PASSIVE – COMBINED BLADES ART**
Auto attacks variably deals magical and physical damage to enemies.
Every 5 auto attacks Alen performs double cut dealing both magical and physical damage.

**Q – HORIZONTAL LEAP**
**COOLDOWN:** 14/12/10/8/6
**COST:** 50/55/60/65/70 MANA
**TARGET RANGE:** 500

**ACTIVE:** Alen dashes in the target direction then stabs an enemy if one is present in the range 
of auto attack. Hitting enemy reduces Horizontal Leap's cooldown by 50%. Next auto attack executed
deals magical damage.

Hitting the enemy deals physical damage and slows the enemy every 5 uses.

**PHYSICAL DAMAGE:**
75/85/95/105//115 (+120% bonus AD)


**W – SLASH**
**COOLDOWN:** 12/10/8/6/4 (9/7.5/6/4.5/3)
**COST:** 50 MANA
**TARGET RANGE:** 425

**ACTIVE:** Alen swings his Neela sword in the target  direction striking enemies in a line.
Hitting enemy reduces Slash's cooldown by 25%.

Each strike deals magical damage and refills 10% of the mana bar every 4 hits.

**MAGICAL DAMAGE:**
120/160/200/240/280 (+100% AP)


**E – PERFECT SYNERGY**
**COOLDOWN:** 20
**COST:** 55 MANA

**PASSIVE:** Alen gains  shield and magic resistance lasting 2 seconds every 10 auto attacks.

**ACTIVE:** Alen gains +50% CDR for his Slash and Horizontal Leap skills except 4s cooldown
between first and second successfull hits on his Slash skill.

**SHIELD:** 35/40/45/50/55
**MAGIC RESISTANCE:** 20 (+25% MR)

**R – BLOOMING THROW**
**COOLDOWN:** 120
**COST:** 120 MANA
**TARGET RANGE:** 800

Alen throws his Neela sword in the target direction dealing magical damage to enemies it passes
throught, stunning last hit enemy. After that, sword gets stuck until the end of stun. 

Using Blooming Throw right after the sword hits last enemy makes it come back to Alen
dealing magical damage to every enemy it passes.

Using Horizontal Leap right after the sword hits last enemy makes Alen dash to the blade
dealing physical damage to every enemy he passes.

During the time of stun, Alen's auto attacks can only deal physical damage to enemies.

**STUN DURATION:** 2/2.5/3 SECONDS
**MAGICAL DAMAGE:** 350/500/650
**PHYSICAL DAMAGE:** 250/450/650

replies.body:
Outside of disliking any spelling aside from "Allen" (Alen, Alan, Allan, Allin), he seems pretty linear in his gameplay.
Passive makes it so enemies need to build Health in order to counter your damage, as Armor or Magic resist leaves the other damage type open, which isn't too bad.
His Q is basically Fiora Q copied to a T. Just insanely longer range.
W is very strange in the way you say it works. Basically if it HITS an enemy you have to wait 4 seconds to recast it? At max rank with 45% CDR it has a cooldown of 2.2 seconds, so hitting an enemy... makes it have a longer cooldown? Or is it supposed to be within 4 seconds instead of after?
E is just a buff to his other skills, and a passive shield.
R is his only interesting skill.
He also has insane movement speed, paired with incredibly high base AD, so early game he would be pretty powerful...

It was supposed to work like Aatrox's Q but with 2 strikes with 4 seconds delay between them (with no modificators) and if u hit both then you have reduced cooldown. But as i look at it right now, it doesn't make much sense so I think I will change it? And btw i don't think it has insane movement speed, Fiora's movement speed is 345 and Alen's is 350 for comparison
Well that's 5 more with a +100 on the Q, so the stick potential is pretty high. Only thing that stops is the fact he can't block CC. CC in general might shut him down pretty hard.
